item.title: The Alchemy of Craft-Centricity: How Kaz Nejatian and Shopify are Shaping the Future of Work
item.description: In the landscape of work and entrepreneurship, a revolution is underway, led by Kaz Nejatian, Vice President of Merchant Services at Shopify.
